attributes.action: Make it an offence to supply goods made of plastics, or packaging made of plastics, which are not re-cyclable. Furthermore it should be mandatory for the recycling class to be clearly marked on the item. It should also be mandatory for local councils to have full recycling facilties for all plastics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My local council, like many others, only has limited facilities for recycling plastics. These facilities should be expanded nationwide to include all plastics. The public should be helped in their sorting of these plastics by clear marking of the type of plastic used so that they can help the recycling collectors by sorting them.
